About Us

Hi! We're an experimental condensed matter group at CSULB. This page is meant mostly as a host for standard operating procedures.

Oxford Teslatron PT Closed Cycle Cryostat

Warm-up, cool down, annual maintenance, probe change, and more!

Electron Beam Evaporator

FEI Quanta 200 Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM)

FEI Quanta 200 Scanning Electron Microscope maintenance (filament, gauge) and electron beam lithography procedure including DesignCAD and NPGS

Transfer Station

Transfer to perform heterostructures

Lindberg Blue Minimite Tube Furnace with Gas Flow Controllers

Programmable tube furnace with gas flow controllers connected to H2, Ar, and CH4 for graphene CVD growth and sample annealing

Teaching

Courses taught as a graduate teaching assistant: Graduate Quantum Mechanics I, II, and Electrodynamics
